comment: /**  * Invoked before the Message is actually sent to the channel.  * This allows for modification of the Message if necessary.  * If this method returns {@code null} then the actual  * send invocation will not occur.  */
code: /**  * Invoked before the Message is actually sent to the channel.  * This allows for modification of the Message if necessary.  * If this method returns {@code null} then the actual  * send invocation will not occur.  */ @Nullable default Message<?> preSend(Message<?> message, MessageChannel channel) {     return message. }

comment: /**  * Invoked immediately after the send invocation. The boolean  * value argument represents the return value of that invocation.  */
code: /**  * Invoked immediately after the send invocation. The boolean  * value argument represents the return value of that invocation.  */ default void postSend(Message<?> message, MessageChannel channel, boolean sent) { }

comment:
/** * Invoked after the completion of a send regardless of any exception that * have been raised thus allowing for proper resource cleanup. *

Note that this will be invoked only if {@link #preSend} successfully * completed and returned a Message, i.e. it did not return {@code null}. * @since 4.1 */
code:
/** * Invoked after the completion of a send regardless of any exception that * have been raised thus allowing for proper resource cleanup. *

Note that this will be invoked only if {@link #preSend} successfully * completed and returned a Message, i.e. it did not return {@code null}. * @since 4.1 */ default void afterSendCompletion(Message message, MessageChannel channel, boolean sent, @Nullable Exception ex) { }

comment: /**  * Invoked as soon as receive is called and before a Message is  * actually retrieved. If the return value is 'false', then no  * Message will be retrieved. This only applies to PollableChannels.  */
code: /**  * Invoked as soon as receive is called and before a Message is  * actually retrieved. If the return value is 'false', then no  * Message will be retrieved. This only applies to PollableChannels.  */ default boolean preReceive(MessageChannel channel) {     return true. }

comment: /**  * Invoked immediately after a Message has been retrieved but before  * it is returned to the caller. The Message may be modified if  * necessary. {@code null} aborts further interceptor invocations.  * This only applies to PollableChannels.  */
code: /**  * Invoked immediately after a Message has been retrieved but before  * it is returned to the caller. The Message may be modified if  * necessary. {@code null} aborts further interceptor invocations.  * This only applies to PollableChannels.  */ @Nullable default Message<?> postReceive(Message<?> message, MessageChannel channel) {     return message. }

comment:
/** * Invoked after the completion of a receive regardless of any exception that * have been raised thus allowing for proper resource cleanup. *

Note that this will be invoked only if {@link #preReceive} successfully * completed and returned {@code true}. * @since 4.1 */
code:
/** * Invoked after the completion of a receive regardless of any exception that * have been raised thus allowing for proper resource cleanup. *

Note that this will be invoked only if {@link #preReceive} successfully * completed and returned {@code true}. * @since 4.1 */ default void afterReceiveCompletion(@Nullable Message message, MessageChannel channel, @Nullable Exception ex) { }
